          <title>
            <string language="en">The structure of the Earth's interior</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Struktur des Innerens der Masse</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La structure de l'intérieur de la terre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A estrutura do interior da terra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La struttura dell'interiore della terra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η δομή του γήινου εσωτερικού</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La estructura del interior de la tierra</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the internal structure of the Earth. This can be used as an exercise to identify the internal parts and components of the Earth.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">earth</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">internal structure</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">iron</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">mantle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">molten outer core</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">nickel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">solid inner core</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">solid rock</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die interne Struktur der 
Masse. Dieses kann als Übung verwendet werden, um die internen 
Teile und die Elemente der Masse zu kennzeichnen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre la structure interne de
la terre. Ceci peut être employé comme exercice pour 
identifier les parties et les composants internes de la terre.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra a estrutura interna da 
terra. Isto pode ser usado como um exercício identificar as 
partes e os componentes internos da terra.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra la struttura interna 
della terra. Ciò può essere usata come esercitazione per 
identificare le parti ed i componenti interni della terra.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει εσωτερική δομή της γης. 
Αυτό μπορεί να χρησιμοποιηθεί ως άσκηση για να προσδιορίσει
τα εσωτερικά μέρη και τα συστατικά της γης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra la estructura interna 
de la tierra. Esto se puede utilizar como ejercicio para 
identificar las partes y los componentes internos de la tierra.</string>
          </description>
